Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I estimate its worth to be around $12000 to you. Considering this, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10000. This offer includes all the features you're looking for and more, ensuring a seamless integration into your workflow or lifestyle. I understand that making such a purchase decision might require careful consideration, so please feel free to ask any questions or request additional information. Looking forward to potentially working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
